duties_responsibilities.duty: Ensuring accurate and timely processing of all Court Ordered Withholding Documents (Garnishments), payments, and compliance with withholding orders and laws.
High-volume data entry and critical analysis of multiple garnishment types in multi-state environments.
Conducting regular reviews of garnishments to verify accuracy and maintaining completed and terminated garnishment orders in the system.
Processing high-volume payrolls according to established schedule and compliance with SOX procedures.
Balancing payroll and reconciling discrepancies in a tight time frame prior to service provider transmission.
Accurate processing of employee overtime pay, bonuses, special payments, and taxable cash and non-cash fringe benefits.
Calculating and processing manual checks, researching and resolving payroll inquiries while maintaining customer service.
Maintaining confidentiality of payroll information and other duties and special projects as assigned.

education_certification.credential: Associate's degree required, Bachelor's degree in Finance, Accounting, or related field preferred
